black.content: This BLACK card doesn't have a name because it's a slave. What should it's name be? _
What makes WHITE people superior to BLACK people? _.
I'm not BLACK, but I still love being on the plantation. One of my favorite things to do is _.
This card is slave to other cards because it's BLACK. What is it's job on the plantation? _.
Why is this BLACK card in an ALL WHITE deck? _.
This card is inferior to the others because it's BLACK. (Throw away two cards.) _. _.
